ygData.subject: Re: rez question
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah like the house in unrest is crazy pl and lag even with not many people, and i hear many stories about how bad cazic gets. Allsar Olath`Vlos - 25th level -
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah like the house in unrest is crazy pl and lag even with not many people,
and i hear many stories about how bad cazic gets.
Allsar Olath`Vlos - 25th level - Rathe
-----Original Message-----
From: Heather M. Daley <blushn@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 6:01 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] rez question


>From: "Heather M. Daley" <blushn@...>
>
>I am on Fennin Ro as well and I have seen that many in unrest and various
>other zones that carry good items as loot, it is like swimming in pea soup
>sometimes, the lag can get really bad
>
>Bree Wyndsdale
>34th Cleric of Fennin Ro
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Date: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 6:47 PM
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] rez question
>
>
>>From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>>
>>no they really are that hard.......sheees 100 ppl??? the most i've ever
>seen in
>>there was like 89......but then again, i'm not on THE most crowded server,
>just
>>one of the most (;
>>
>>(\/)ystix Spellchaser
>>lv 40 <did manage to get into the 1st bar in a 3 hour time span by
>soloing ): >
>>human cleric of The Rathe
>>
>>Slithey Tove wrote:
>>
>>> From: "Slithey Tove" <slithey@...>
>>>
>>> Hm. I went from 16 to 17 pretty quickly in Unrest. And from 17 to 18.
And
>>> from 18 to... well, I am two bubbles away from 19, should make it by
>>> tomorrow.
>>>
>>> It helps, I suppose that I have lucked into some very good, cohesive
>groups
>>> (as well as a couple of awful ones) that took on red stuff and beat up
on
>it
>>> very successfully.
>>>
>>> Is it really true that levels 30, 35, and so on are unusually hard? Has
>>> Verant confirmed this, or is it just a subjective impression of players?
>How
>>> fast you level depends a lot on what you are fighting, of course. Unrest
>is
>>> very good for both xp and loot for levels 16 through 30 or so...which is
>>> probably why there were 100 people (count 'em 100) in the zone at one
>point
>>> last night, and every single room was camped.
>>>
>>> == Gilead, dwarven cleric of Fennin Ro
>>>
>>> -----Original Message-----
>>> From: Alvarez, Ruben (consultant) <ruben.alvarez@...>
>>> To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com' <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>>> Date: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 3:40 PM
>>> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] rez question
>>>
>>> >From: "Alvarez, Ruben (consultant)" <ruben.alvarez@...>
>>> >
>>> >I had the same problem from level 16 to 17. It took forever! I talked
>to
>>> >some other people and they said the same thing to me.
>>> >
>>> >Qanin
>>> >
>>> >-----Original Message-----
>>> >From: Mystik [mailto:mystik@...]
>>> >Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 3:28 PM
>>> >To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>>> >Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] rez question
>>> >
>>> >
>>> >From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>>> >
>>> >not qute....lv 30, 35, 40, and 45 are barrier levels....which means it
>>> takes
>>> >way
>>> >longer to get exp in those lv....going from 30 to 31 took almost twice
>as
>>> >long
>>> >as opposed to going from 31 to 32.....even though it will say you gain
>>> party
>>> >exp
>>> >or whatever, it doesn't show much because it is a barrier lv
>>> >
>>> >Azor wrote:
>>> >
>>> >> From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
>>> >>
>>> >> I think what she was saying is it depends on what Lvl the person
>you're
>>> >> casting it on is on. Like since I'm still lvl 15 (should hit Lvl 16
>>> >> sometime today), if casted it on me I would not get much exp back but
>if
>>> >you
>>> >> casted it on a played say that was Lvl 45 they'd get a good bit back.
>>> >> So I take it you finally got you one of those Staff of the Observer
>>> you've
>>> >> been wanting forever. Hope you like it and congrats on Lvl 40. Why
>is
>>> >Lvl
>>> >> 40 gonna suck by the way? Is it like Lvl 20 when ya die you lose
>close
>>> to
>>> >a
>>> >> bubble of exp? If thats why then I guess on Lvl 40 you what lose
>close
>>> to
>>> >> two bubbles of exp?
>>> >>
>>> >> **************************
>>> >> Azor
>>> >> Lvl 15 Human Cleric of the Rathe
>>> >> **************************
>>> >>
>>> >> > From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>>> >> >
>>> >> > actually, that does make a lot of sense.....it would seem that hte
>>> >higher
>>> >> lv you
>>> >> > are, the more exp you can give back.....i just know now that i have
>to
>>> >go
>>> >> thru
>>> >> > hell all over again....lv 40's gonna SUCK majorly......o btw, i
have
>a
>>> >> question
>>> >> > about the staff of the observer while i'm thinking about it....it
>has
>>> >one
>>> >> charge
>>> >> > of the sentinel spell....<which is a crock ir should be unlimited
>like
>>> >the
>>> >> > jboots> but is there anyway to recharge it or maybe does it
recharge
>on
>>> >> it's own
>>> >> > <that was suggested to me by a guildmate> or do i just have to get
a
>>> new
>>> >> staff?
>>> >> > which would suck there too....any info would be greatly appreciated
>on
>>> >> this...i
>>> >> > love that staff, and the sentinel effect was really kewl and would
>come
>>> >in
>>> >> handy
>>> >> > in places like cazic and lower guk....
>>> >> >
